wikipedia_page.main: Samantha Harvey (born 30 May 1993) is an English pop singer and songwriter currently signed to Virgin EMI Records in the UK and Capitol Records in the US. She initially gained a following by posting covers of popular songs on her YouTube channel. Her independently released 2017 single, "Forgive Forget," peaked at number 48 on the UK Singles Chart. She released her first major label single, "Please," in February 2018. She followed that with her major label debut EP, also titled Please, in March 2018.
